Equator/Prime Meridian is KSC.

If you guys really want to do this, just use texture replacer and take a map of Kerbin. It has to be a real map, not a Kerbin Texture for texture replacer or something. I used this one:

It's from 0.17, I couldn't find a good recent map that was a single image, and for some reason texture replacer maps have white on their ground, I don't know why. Anyway, just rename the map image to "HudNavBall" in the gamedata/texturereplacer/default folder, and then load up the game.
